description:
A chance meeting with Aone of Stella Maris shakes Mana to her core as bad memories come flooding back. If Mana`s so talented, what`s holding her back?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Senpai to wa Ie Sukoshi Damaraserubeki ka
She Is My Senpai, but Maybe I Should Shut Her Up
先輩とはいえ少し黙らせるべきか
